JOB DESCRIPTION: Excellent problem solving skills.-Excellent in C#.-Experience in developing websites using .Net Core MVC and Web API.-Experience in writing UTCs.-Proficient in .Net Core.-Basic understanding of Microservices Architecture.-Proficient in implementing basic design patterns like Factory, Facade, IoC etc.-Knowledge of Azure DevOps would be preferred.-Proficiency in resolving cross browsers issue and ensuring compatibility.-Strong, clear and concise written and verbal communication skills.-Self-driven, reliable and determined team player.-Flexible and able to adapt to new processes and requirements in a dynamic environment.-Deliver results within agreed deadlines.-Positive Attitude/"Can-do" approach.
